mapper.select: SELECT eps.no, eps.compid, eps.expid, ep.expname, ep.expbizfield, ep.exptel FROM expertscrap eps, expert ep WHERE ROWNUM < 5 and compid = #{compid} and eps.expid = ep.id order by no desc
SELECT eps.no, eps.compid, eps.expid, ep.expname, ep.expbizfield, ep.exptel FROM expertscrap eps, expert ep WHERE compid = #{compid} and eps.expid = ep.id order by no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expertscrap(no, compid, expid) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(no)+1,0) FROM expertscrap), #{compid}, #{expid})
